Uses of Class
org.apache.beam.sdk.io.UnboundedSource

  • Packages that use UnboundedSource 
    Package Description
    org.apache.beam.runners.core
    Provides utilities for Beam runner authors.
    org.apache.beam.runners.spark.io
    Spark-specific transforms for I/O.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.io
    Defines transforms for reading and writing common storage formats, including AvroIO, and TextIO.

      abstract UnboundedSource<OutputT,?> UnboundedSource.UnboundedReader.getCurrentSource()
      Returns the UnboundedSource that created this reader.

      Returns the UnboundedSource used to create this Read PTransform.
      static UnboundedSource<Long,CountingSource.CounterMark> CountingSource.unbounded()
      Deprecated. 
      use CountingInput.unbounded() instead
      static UnboundedSource<Long,CountingSource.CounterMark> CountingSource.unboundedWithTimestampFn(SerializableFunction<Long,org.joda.time.Instant> timestampFn)
      Deprecated. 
      use CountingInput.unbounded() and call CountingInput.UnboundedCountingInput.withTimestampFn(SerializableFunction) instead

      Returns a list of UnboundedSource objects representing the instances of this source that should be used when executing the workflow.
